name: NeuraGrid
description: A cutting-edge cybernetic armor torso piece designed to withstand the harshest cyberattacks. Its advanced NeuraGrid technology allows it to absorb incoming damage while providing adaptive shielding that constantly upgrades based on the player's neural interface activity.

flavor.rationale: Players would find this legendary armor in a section where high-tech breaches have occurred, as it is an upgraded version of standard armor designed specifically for those who need enhanced protection against cyberware.
